bio: 4 years of programming experience, and 4 years of graphics design experience provide you with a professional product you can trust. We have already developed many of the tools necessary to meet the growing needs of your business and their internet presence. This means we can get things done, better and faster than the competition, while keeping things affordible. Among some of the modules we already have developed are a content management system, newsletters, photo galleries, forums, mailing lists, admin logs, security systems, and more. What we don't have yet can be integrated with a lot... Show all

Work Terms
Most projects are divided into a 50/30/20 payment schedule. 50% up front, 30% upon our completion of the work, and then the final 20% after your review. We do break large projects up into more milestones when its fit to do so
